author: bridge-bot
content:
<terencechain> One concern is how much additional latency this adds to the current critical path. With timing constraints, each node already has less than 1 second to process a block. Latency comes from two places:

1. Block proposal: As a proposer, I have to parse the attestations to get the transactions. How does this work with MEV-Boost and builders? Will they be forced to use local blocks?

2. Block processing: Parsing through attestations to get the transactions and penalizing a censoring block is a cross layer action, takes longer and will require additional engine API calls to accomplish this.
